name: Mage 3D
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left Click to shoot

Known Bugs:

  • Levels 5&6 are incomplete
  • Aiming/Movement is off since i updated the Unity File

My Accomplishments while making / What I learned:

  • Learned that having a large scope will make your project suffer if you don't have enough deadline. I had 3 months to create this game while also managing 5 other classes and a part time job. To keep it short, I wanted to add too much to the game and in doing so its overall completeness and attention to detail suffered dearly
  • First 3rd person / 3D game in unity.
